name: Catnip Trip
description:
Coots the cat has sniffed too much catnip and is late for his date! Help him level-up by sniffing more catnip and gaining new abilities to survive his trip and get to the cat flap!

In this hack-and-slash, you will play as Coots the cat in a 2D pixel game, making your way through his owners house, surviving the monsters from Coots's catnip induced hallucinations.  

Coots's love interest is waiting for him outside and time is running out. Better hurry up! 

tatecogn/Catnip-Trip (github.com)
